name: Maze War VR Multi-Player
description:
Maze War VR is a remake of the very first first person shooter game, a maze shooter released in 1974 by Steve Colley and Greg Thompson at the NASA Ames Research Center in California. This version recreates the original game in virtual reality, allowing you to play against the machine or challenge your friends to an online death match.

Watch the game trailer on YouTube.

Compatibility info: The solo game is playable on "itch.io", but will not work in multi-player mode due to a WebRTC failure. For multi-player mode, please visit "mazewar.marciot.com".

Samsung GearVR users should visit "mazewar.marciot.com" using "Samsung Internet" from the "Oculus Home" (while in VR mode). The game will also support the Oculus Rift or HTC Vive with a WebVR compatible browser.

Maze War VR is open-source. If you like this project, please consider supporting me here on "itch.io" via a one-time donation here or a monthly donation at "https://www.patreon.com/marciot"
